summary: Completed comprehensive backend testing of CareerIQ analysis pipeline focusing on OpenAI JSON format fix verification. All backend APIs working perfectly with 100% success rate. OpenAI integration appears healthy with no server errors detected.
passed_tests: POST /api/upload accepts resume and LinkedIn PDF files with proper text extraction
POST /api/create-order creates Razorpay orders correctly for all tiers (499, 2999, 4999)
POST /api/verify-payment endpoint exists and handles requests properly
POST /api/analyze endpoint exists and correctly requires payment (returns 402)
GET /api/session/{session_id} returns correct session status and metadata
All LLM pipeline endpoints exist and respond correctly (/api/analyze, /api/verify-payment, /api/upgrade, /api/verify-upgrade, /api/send-report)
OpenAI integration health check - no server errors (500) detected when processing analysis requests
File upload with substantial PDF content (resume and LinkedIn profiles)
Order creation and session management workflow
Payment verification endpoint structure and validation
